content: As of August 2021, the fastest time ever recorded in the 100-meter sprint for men is 9.58 seconds, set by Usain Bolt of Jamaica at the 2009 World Championships in Berlin, Germany. The fastest time ever recorded in the 100-meter sprint for women is 10.49 seconds, set by Florence Griffith-Joyner of the United States at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul, South Korea.
